member.summary: Gets the white point index number

member.name: T:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor
member.summary: Represents an EDID detailed timing descriptor block

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.HorizontalActivePixels
member.summary: Gets the horizontal active pixels (0–4095)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.HorizontalBlankingPixels
member.summary: Gets the horizontal blanking pixels (0–4095)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.HorizontalBorderPixels
member.summary: Gets the horizontal border pixels (each side; total is twice this)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.HorizontalDisplaySize
member.summary: Gets the horizontal display size, mm (0–4095 mm, 161 in)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.HorizontalSyncOffset
member.summary: Gets the horizontal sync offset

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.HorizontalSyncPolarity
member.summary: Gets the digital display's horizontal sync polarity

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.HorizontalSyncPulse
member.summary: Gets the horizontal sync pulse width (0–1023)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.IsInterlaced
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating that the timing's scan mode is interlaced

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.IsSyncOnAllRGBLines
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating that the sync is on all 3 RGB lines (else green only)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.IsVerticalSyncSerrated
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating that the vertical sync is serrated (HSync during VSync)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.PixelClock
member.summary: Gets the pixel clock in hz. (0.01–655.35 MHz)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.StereoMode
member.summary: Gets the type of the stereo signal supported

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.SyncType
member.summary: Gets the type of display sync signal

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.VerticalActivePixels
member.summary: Gets the vertical active lines (0–4095)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.VerticalBlankingPixels
member.summary: Gets the vertical blanking lines (0–4095)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.VerticalBorderPixels
member.summary: Gets the vertical border lines (each side; total is twice this)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.VerticalDisplaySize
member.summary: Gets the vertical display size, mm

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.VerticalSyncOffset
member.summary: Gets the vertical sync offset lines (0–63)

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.VerticalSyncPolarity
member.summary: Gets the digital display's vertical sync polarity

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.DetailedTimingDescriptor.VerticalSyncPulse
member.summary: Gets the vertical sync pulse width lines (0–63)

member.summary: Represents an EDID string descriptor block

member.summary: Gets the type of the data stored as a string

member.name: P:EDIDParser.Descriptors.StringDescriptor.Value
member.summary: Gets the string data

member.name: T:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters
member.summary: Represents the basic display parameters of a device

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.AnalogDisplayType
member.summary: Gets the display type of this analog device

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.ChromaticityCoordinates
member.summary: Gets an instance of ChromaticityCoordinates type containing the CIE Chromaticity xy coordinates for red, green, blue, and white

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.DigitalDisplayType
member.summary: Gets the display type of this digital device

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.DisplayGamma
member.summary: Gets the display gamma value (1.00 – 3.54)
member.exception: There is no information about the gamma property of the display.

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.DisplaySizeInInch
member.summary: Gets the calculated size of the display diagonal in inch

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsActiveOffSupported
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the DPMS active-off supported

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsBlankToBlackExpected
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the Blank-to-black setup (pedestal) is expected

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsCompositeSyncSupported
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the composite sync (on HSync) is supported

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsDefaultGTFSupported
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the display supports GTF with default parameter values

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsDFPTMDSCompatible
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the signal is compatible with VESA DFP 1.x TMDS CRGB, 1 pixel per clock, up to 8 bits per color, MSB aligned

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsDigital
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the device uses the digital signal for communication

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsPreferredTimingModeAvailable
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the preferred timing mode specified in descriptor block 1. For EDID 1.3+ the preferred timing mode is always in the first Detailed Timing Descriptor

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsPreferredTimingModeIncludesNativeInformation
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the preferred timing mode includes native pixel format and refresh rate. This value is always false for EDID 1.2-

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsProjector
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating that the display don't have a fixed size

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsSeparateSyncSupported
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating that the separate sync is supported

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsStandardSRGBColorSpace
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating that the devices uses the standard sRGB colour space

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsStandbySupported
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the DPMS standby supported

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsSuspendSupported
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the DPMS suspend supported

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsSyncOnGreenSupported
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating that sync on green is supported

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.IsVSyncSerratedOnComposite
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating that VSync pulse must be serrated when composite or sync-on-green is used

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.PhysicalHeight
member.summary: Gets the device physical height in cm
member.exception: Display don't have a fixed size.

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.PhysicalWidth
member.summary: Gets the device physical width in cm
member.exception: Display don't have a fixed size.

member.name: P:EDIDParser.DisplayParameters.VideoWhiteLevel
member.summary: Gets the analog video white and sync levels, relative to blank

member.summary: Represents a Extended Display Identification Data instance

member.summary: Creates a new EDID instance with the provided EDID binary data
member.param: An array of bytes holding the EDID binary data

member.summary: Gets the enumerable list of descriptor blocks

member.summary: Gets an instance of DisplayParameters type representing the basic display parameters

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.EDIDVersion
member.summary: Gets the EDID specification version number

member.summary: Gets the enumerable list of extensions blocks

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.ManufactureDate
member.summary: Gets the date of manufacturing of the device with accuracy of +-6 days

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.ManufacturerCode
member.summary: Gets the manufacturer identification assigned by Microsoft to the device vendors in string

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.ManufacturerId
member.summary: Gets the manufacturer identification assigned by Microsoft to the device vendors as a numberic value

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.ManufactureWeek
member.summary: Gets the week of the device device production date as a number between 1 and 54

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.ManufactureYear
member.summary: Gets the year of the device device production date as a number between 1990 and 2245

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.NumberOfExtensions
member.summary: Gets the expected number of extension blocks

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.ProductCode
member.summary: Gets the product identification code assigned by Microsoft to this series of devices

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.ProductYear
member.summary: Gets the year of the device device production or the model year of this product as a number between 1990 and 2245

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.SerialNumber
member.summary: Gets the numberic serial number of the device

member.name: P:EDIDParser.EDID.Timings
member.summary: Gets the enumerable list of valid timing combinations
